meaningMnemonic: If you take a <radical>cow</radical>'s <radical>life</radical> you're turning it into an <kanji>offering</kanji>. In the old days, cows' lives were given to the gods as offerings pretty often.
readingMnemonic: You prepare the <kanji>offering</kanji> with your holy blue <reading>sa</reading>ber (せい). Normally this would be gruesome, but your saber glows and the cow's life shoots up into the sky without you laying a hand on it.
